RoleAuthorizer.LDAPPath: If role authorization is used then this is the LDAP path

TestKeys.Name: YourTestKeyName
AuthorizedRoles: On prem AD groups that should have access to this key, if this value is present then the authorized emails will not be used
AuthorizedEmailAddress: Emails of users that have access to this key.
TestKeys.PublicPem: The public key in PEM format.  It should not include the BEGIN and END lines
TestKeys.PrivatePem: The private key in PEM format.  It should not include the BEGIN and END lines
